mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(center_code), 0000000) as centerCode FROM CENTER

SELECT rnum, "centerCode", "centerName", "centerTel", "centerAddress", "centerGuide", "centerOpeningDate", "centerClosingDate", "centerCondition", "userCode", "userName" FROM( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, "centerCode", "centerName", "centerTel", "centerAddress", "centerGuide", "centerOpeningDate", "centerClosingDate", "centerCondition", "userCode", "userName" FROM( SELECT C.center_code as "centerCode" , C.center_name as "centerName" , C.center_tel as "centerTel" , C.center_address as "centerAddress" , C.center_guide as "centerGuide" , C.center_opening_date as "centerOpeningDate" , C.center_closing_date as "centerClosingDate" , NVL2(TO_CHAR(C.center_closing_date),'closed',NVL2(TO_CHAR(C.center_opening_date),TO_CHAR(FLOOR(C.center_opening_Date - SYSDATE)),'notyet')) AS "centerCondition" , U.user_code as "userCode" , U.user_name as "userName" FROM center C LEFT OUTER JOIN mapping M ON C.center_code = M.center_code LEFT OUTER JOIN userinfo U ON M.user_code = U.user_code ORDER BY "centerCode" ) )

select NVL2(TO_CHAR(center_closing_date),'closed',NVL2(TO_CHAR(center_opening_date),TO_CHAR(FLOOR(center_opening_Date - SYSDATE)),'notyet')) AS "centerCondition" from center where center_code = #{centerCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE CENTER SET center_name = #{centerName}, center_tel = #{centerTel}, center_address = #{centerAddress}, center_guide = #{centerGuide}, center_opening_date = #{centerOpeningDate}, center_closing_date = #{centerClosingDate} WHERE center_code = #{centerCode}
